00022 template <class ModelInterface>
00023 class TSingleModelObserverBase: public CSingleModelObserverBase
00024 {
00025 public:
00026        typedef CSingleModelObserverBase BaseClass;
00027        typedef ModelInterface ModelType;
00028 
00029        TSingleModelObserverBase();
00030 
00031        ModelInterface* GetObjectPtr() const;
00032 
00036        bool AttachOrSetObject(ModelInterface* objectPtr);
00037 
00038        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00039        virtual bool OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00040        virtual bool OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr);
00041

00043        virtual ModelInterface* CastFromModel(imod::IModel* modelPtr) const;

00052 template <class ModelInterface>
00053 TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::TSingleModelObserverBase()
00054 {
00055        m_objectPtr = NULL;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 template <class ModelInterface>
00060 ModelInterface* TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::GetObjectPtr() const
00061 {
00062        return m_objectPtr;
00063 }

00065 
00066 template <class ModelInterface>
00067 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::AttachOrSetObject(ModelInterface* objectPtr)
00068 {
00069        EnsureModelDetached();
00070 
00071        imod::IModel* modelPtr = dynamic_cast<imod::IModel*>(objectPtr);
00072 
00073        bool retVal = false;
00074        if ((modelPtr != NULL) && modelPtr->AttachObserver(this)){
00075               retVal = true;
00076        }
00077 
00078        m_objectPtr = objectPtr;
00079 
00080        return retVal;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00085 
00086 template <class ModelInterface>
00087 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnAttached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00088 {
00089        m_objectPtr = CastFromModel(modelPtr);
00090 
00091        I_IF_DEBUG(
00092               if (m_objectPtr == NULL){
00093                      QString exptectedObjectInterface = typeid(ModelInterface).name();
00094 
00095                      QString debugMessage = QString("Data model interface is not supported by this observer. Expected interface is: %1").arg(exptectedObjectInterface);
00096 
00097                      qDebug(debugMessage.toUtf8());
00098               }
00099        )
00100 
00101        if ((m_objectPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::OnAttached(modelPtr)){
00102               return true;
00103        }
00104 
00105        BaseClass::EnsureModelDetached();
00106 
00107        return false;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 template <class ModelInterface>
00112 bool TSingleModelObserverBase<ModelInterface>::OnDetached(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00113 {
00114        if (BaseClass::OnDetached(modelPtr)){
00115               // If model was correctly attached m_objectPtr cannot be NULL. OnDetach returns true only if model was correctly attached.
00116               Q_ASSERT(m_objectPtr != NULL);
00117 
00118               m_objectPtr = NULL;
00119 
00120               return true;
00121        }
00122 
00123        return false;
00124 }

00132        return dynamic_cast<ModelInterface*>(modelPtr);
00133 }
